item.description:
** Riesling Theme**
Dick and Eleanor will present an assortment of Rieslings.

**Can you bring an Appetizer ?? **
** We need 3-4 **

The agenda is:
o Greeting wine
o Educational topics
o Tasting
o Appetizers
o Mystery Wine
o AWS News
.
For those new to the meeting... We'll divide the wine cost by those attending. I'll send an estimate the day before.

Since there are more people than I can comfortably accommodate, a waiting list has been established.
Please check your calendars to be sure you can attend.

Mike

AWS Meetup Group
item.name: The AWS Wine August Meetup
